overview:
Dennis is co-founder and Managing Partner of Triathlon Medical Ventures in Cincinnati. Dennis brings more than 30 years of industry experience in both therapeutics and medical devices to Triathlon. Dennis was with Senmed Medical Ventures from 1996 to 2003 where he originated and managed early and later-stage investments and provided general management for Senmed’s start-up investments. He previously represented Senmed Medical Ventures on several boards and currently represents Triathlon on the board of Suturtek.

Prior to joining Senmed in 1996, he served in general management and senior marketing and business development positions for both large public and small private life science companies including American Critical Care (a division of American Hospital Supply Corporation), Clonetics Inc, Regent Hospital Products and Hana Biologics.
